0.title: ESTEEMED MIRA Program Application Form
0.description: Application form for students to utilize in joining the ESTEEMED MIRA program.

fields.label: Personal Section Eligibility Reminder
fields.content:
Reminder: Among other eligibility requirements, applicants to the ESTEEMED MIRA program must be incoming Freshmen at WSU Pullman who have applied to and been accepted to be a member of the WSU Honors College. Moreover, they must be from a group that is underrepresented in the sciences and be planning to major in a science or engineering field.

Note: Required fields are marked by a red asterisk symbol (*) and faint red highlighting. Please contact our web coordinator if you encounter any problems with this application form so we can provide you with further assistance.

fields.label: Do you have a WSU ID#?

fields.label: What high school are you currently attending?
High School Courses
fields.description: List all the science and math classes you have taken in high school. Please include courses you have taken for college credit (for example, AP, Running Start, or College in High School). Note: Use the plus button at the end of each row to insert a new, empty row to the list.

choices.text: Course Type* (e.g., Honors, AP, Running Start, etc.)
choices.value: Course Type* (e.g., Honors, AP, Running Start, etc.)

choices.text: Final Grade (A, B, C, Pass, Fail, etc.)
choices.value: Final Grade (A, B, C, Pass, Fail, etc.)

fields.label: Course List Footnote
fields.content: *If applicable; can be left blank.

fields.label: Please provide a personal statement.
fields.description: Your personal statement must describe any activities or experiences that you feel have prepared you for university-level studies and research in the sciences.

fields.label: Goals & Interests Section Eligibility Reminder
fields.content:
Reminder: Among other eligibility requirements, applicants to the ESTEEMED MIRA program must be incoming Freshmen at WSU who have applied to and been accepted to be a member of the WSU Honors College. Moreover, they must be from a group that is underrepresented in the sciences and be planning to major in a science or engineering field.

Note: Required fields are marked by a red asterisk symbol (*) and faint red highlighting. Please contact our web coordinator if you encounter any problems with this application form so we can provide you with further assistance.

fields.label: Discuss your goals and interests in depth.
fields.description: Describe your scientific or engineering interests, career plans, and why you might be interested in a doctoral degree in the biomedical sciences. Moreover, discuss how WSU ESTEEMED MIRA program will help you meet your goals.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

confirmations.name: Save and Continue Confirmation
confirmations.message:
Please use the following link to return and complete this form from any computer.

{save_link}

Note: This link will expire after 30 days.
Enter your email address if you would like to receive the link via email.

{save_email_input}

confirmations.name: Save and Continue Email Sent Confirmation
confirmations.message: Success!The link was sent to the following email address: {save_email}

notifications.name: Save and Continue Email
notifications.subject: Link to continue {form_title}
notifications.message:
Thank you for saving {form_title}. Please use the unique link below to return to the form from any computer.

{save_link}

Remember that the link will expire after 30 days so please return via the provided link to complete your form submission.
